settings.html: The WIDE CW120N Dual DP is a high-resolution 12MP medical imaging monitor meticulously designed for the precision and clarity required in radiology and mammography. The WIDE CW120N Dual DP 31-inch display offers robust performance, advanced calibration features, and exceptional image quality, making it an ideal choice for radiologists.

settings.title: Ultimate Radiology Display
settings.content: The Barco Nio Fusion MDNC-12130 12MP color fusion breast imaging diagnostic monitor, marking a notable advancement in display technology. This monitor simplifies workflow by seamlessly integrating PACS and breast images on a single workstation, eliminating the need for intricate configurations, multi-head displays, or switching to another workstation for additional exams. Radiologists can expect improved efficiency with faster reading sessions, complemented by the monitor's high brightness and screen size, which are notable in the realm of diagnostic radiology monitors. The Barco Nio Fusion MDNC-12130 functions as a PACS display, enhancing diagnostic accuracy and efficiency for radiologists and PACS display users alike. This technology facilitates quicker and more precise diagnoses, contributing to enhanced patient care outcomes. Explore the Barco Nio Fusion MDNC-12130 for a refined diagnostic radiology experience.

settings.title: Self DICOM Calibration & Compliance
settings.content: The WIDE CW120N Dual DP features self-DICOM calibration with a 14-bit LUT and built-in sensors, ensuring consistent image quality and compliance with medical imaging standards. This functionality guarantees that the monitor maintains accurate brightness and grayscale, essential for reliable diagnostic interpretations.

settings.title: Embedded IQ Sensor®
settings.content:
The embedded IQ Sensor® in the WIDE CW120N Dual DP provides automated calibration to maintain optimal performance. This sensor continuously measures and adjusts the monitor's luminance, ensuring that the display remains consistent with DICOM standards without requiring manual intervention.

Key Advantages:

  • Automated Calibration: The IQ Sensor® eliminates the need for frequent manual calibrations, saving time for radiologists and ensuring consistent image quality.
  • Continuous Monitoring: By continually measuring luminance, the sensor ensures that the display adapts to any changes in brightness over time, maintaining accurate and reliable image reproduction.
  • Adherence to DICOM Standards: The sensor guarantees that the WIDE CW120N Dual DP's performance aligns with DICOM standards, which is crucial for accurate diagnostic interpretations.
  • Ease of Use: With the automated calibration process, radiologists can focus more on their diagnostic work rather than worrying about display settings, enhancing workflow efficiency.
  • Enhanced Accuracy: The consistent luminance adjustment helps in detecting subtle differences in medical images, which is vital for precise diagnosis.

settings.title: True 10-Bit Color
settings.content: True 10-bit color depth in the WIDE CW120N Dual DP delivers over a billion colors, ensuring detailed and accurate image reproduction. This high color fidelity is critical for radiologists who require precise and nuanced images for accurate diagnoses. With true 10-bit color, the CW120N provides smoother gradations and more detailed shades, which are essential for detecting subtle differences in medical imaging. Additionally, the advanced full 10-bit image processing algorithms, combined with a 14-bit LUT, ensure that the images are rendered with the highest possible accuracy and consistency, making it an exceptional tool for diagnostic applications .

settings.title: Luminance Uniformity Control (LUC)
settings.content: The Wide CW120N Dual DP features an on-board luminance correlation sensor, SBC (Self-Brightness Control), which continually monitors changes in backlight luminance and automatically adjusts to achieve optimal brightness.

settings.title: Luminance Uniformity Control (LUC)
settings.content: The CW120N Dual DP medical imaging display ensures highly accurate luminance uniformity across the entire screen. Achieving this uniformity can be challenging due to the construction of TFT LCD displays. However, the innovative Luminance Uniformity Control (LUC) function in the CW120N Dual DP effectively normalizes luminance from edge to edge, providing consistent and reliable performance.”

settings.title: Human Detector
settings.content: The Human Detector function periodically checks for the presence of a user in front of the WIDE CW120N Dual DP monitor using infrared sensors. If the user is not detected for a predefined period, the CW120N Dual DP automatically enters power-saving mode. This not only reduces energy consumption but also minimizes wear on the backlight, thereby extending the lifespan of the CW120N Dual DP. Additionally, the Human Detector enhances security by dimming or blanking the screen when the user steps away, ensuring sensitive information is not visible to unauthorized viewers.

settings.title: Private Lite | Ambient Sensor
settings.content: The WIDE CW120N Dual DP includes Private Lite and Ambient Lite features to enhance user comfort and productivity. Private Lite provides localized lighting to the user’s workspace, while Ambient Lite adjusts the screen brightness based on surrounding light conditions, ensuring consistent visibility and reducing eye strain. Additionally, the Wall Light feature ensures that the surrounding environment is well-lit without causing glare on the screen, further enhancing the viewing experience.

settings.title: Separated UI Display
settings.content: The WIDE CW120N Dual DP monitor features a separated 3.5-inch UI display with a resolution of 340×800. This secondary display provides easy access to monitor settings and status information without obstructing the primary diagnostic images, allowing for uninterrupted workflow.

settings.title: Ports
settings.content:
The WIDE CW120N Dual DP is equipped with versatile connectivity options:

  • Dual DisplayPort connectors for high-resolution input
  • USB 3.0 compliance with one upstream and two downstream ports
  • Service port for maintenance and updates

01. USB 3.0
02. USB 3.0
03. Service port for maintenance and updates (Connecting a USB
to the Service Port ③ may cause a serious damage.)
04. Upstream port
05. Display Port
06. Display Port
07. Power Connector
08. Work Light

settings.title: Dimensions & Weight
settings.content:
Dimensions (Net): W: 689 mm (27") x H: 647 mm (25.4") x D: 237 mm (9.3")

Weight (Net): 20.0 Kg (44.09 lbs)

settings.title: Ambient Light Compensation (ALC)
settings.content: Barco Nio Fusion MDNC-12130 comes equipped with Barco's Ambient Light Compensation (ALC) technology, designed to ensure unwavering DICOM compliance under all lighting conditions. This innovative feature measures the display brightness against the surrounding ambient light. Working in tandem with MediCal QAWeb, it notifies users when the ambient light exceeds a predefined threshold. This intelligent feature guarantees impeccable image quality, enabling you to discern crucial details regardless of your workspace lighting conditions. The ALC feature empowers you with the ability to maintain consistent DICOM compliance and exceptional image quality in varying environments.

settings.title: Uniform Luminance Technology
settings.content:
In the realm of medical imaging, achieving optimal image quality is crucial for accurate diagnosis and treatment planning. The Barco Nio Fusion MDNC-12130 distinguishes itself in this aspect, featuring exceptional image uniformity attributed to its innovative Uniform Luminance Technology (ULT).

ULT technology is a sophisticated calibration and correction system designed to meticulously address variations in backlight intensity across the monitor's screen, commonly known as luminance non-uniformity. This issue can result in subtle brightness and color inconsistencies.

Through a multi-step process, ULT technology eliminates these inconsistencies, ensuring that every pixel on the screen displays the intended image data with unwavering accuracy.

Key Benefits of ULT Technology: Enhanced Diagnostic Confidence, Reduced Eye Strain, Improved Workflow Efficiency

settings.title: Enhanced Adjustability for Optimal Viewing
settings.content: The ergonomic design includes height, tilt, and swivel adjustments, allowing users to position the monitor for maximum comfort and efficiency during long diagnostic sessions. The WIDE CW120N Dual DP's stand provides a height adjustment range of 0-110mm, tilt adjustment from -3° to 15°, and swivel adjustment from -20° to 20°. These adjustments ensure that the monitor can be tailored to individual user preferences, reducing physical strain and enhancing overall productivity in a clinical setting.

settings.title: SoftGlow: Customizable Ambient Lighting for Enhanced Radiologist Comfort
settings.content: Combat eye fatigue and enhance your radiology reading room experience with SoftGlow™, an adjustable ambiance lighting solution. The SoftGlow™ wall light provides ambient illumination behind the monitor, creating a comfortable working environment for radiologists. Additionally, the SoftGlow™ task light directs focused light onto papers and film folders, ensuring optimal visibility and comfort during essential tasks. Experience improved well-being and productivity with SoftGlow's tailored lighting approach for radiology professionals.

settings.title: Enhanced Adjustability for Optimal Viewing
settings.content: The monitor’s stand provides height, tilt, and swivel adjustments, allowing users to customize the viewing angle for maximum comfort during extended diagnostic sessions. The ability to adjust the monitor enhances productivity and reduces strain.

settings.title: Optimal Size, Weight, and Image Quality
settings.content: The Barco Nio Fusion MDNC-12130 12MP medical display monitor is designed with the perfect balance of size and weight for maximum functionality and convenience. Standing at a height of 472mm (18.5 inches), Nio Fusion boasts a width of 491mm (19.3 inches) and a depth of 235mm (9.2 inches), providing ample viewing space for radiologists. With a weight of 16.6kg (36.5 lbs), including the stand, and 12kg (26.4 lbs) without the stand, the The Barco Nio Fusion MDNC-12130 is both sturdy and durable. Whether at the hospital or at home, The Barco Nio Fusion is a top-of-the-line PACS display for radiologists seeking the perfect combination of size, capability, and image quality.
